org.pipservices.runtime

Interface IComponentFactory

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ComponentFactory, DefaultFactory

    public interface IComponentFactory
    Factory for microservice components. It registers component classes, locates classes by descriptors and creates component instances. It also supports inheritance from other factories.
    Since:
    2016-06-09
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Sergey Seroukhov

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      IComponent create(ComponentDescriptor descriptor)
      Create a component instance using class located by component descriptor.
      void extend(IComponentFactory... baseFactories)
      Extends this factory with base factories.
      Class<?> find(ComponentDescriptor descriptor)
      Lookups for component class by matching component descriptor.
      IComponentFactory register(ComponentDescriptor descriptor, Class<?> classFactory)
      Registers a component class accompanies by component descriptor.

    • Method Detail

      • extend

        void extend(IComponentFactory... baseFactories)
        Extends this factory with base factories.
        Parameters:
        baseFactories - a list of base factories to extend registrations of this factory.

      • register

        IComponentFactory register(ComponentDescriptor descriptor,
                           Class<?> classFactory)
        Registers a component class accompanies by component descriptor.
        Parameters:
        descriptor - a component descriptor to locate the class.
        classFactory - a component class used to create a component.
        Returns:
        a reference to this factory to support chaining registrations.

      • find

        Class<?> find(ComponentDescriptor descriptor)
       throws MicroserviceError
        Lookups for component class by matching component descriptor.
        Parameters:
        descriptor - a component descriptor used to locate a class
        Returns:
        a located component class.
        Throws:
        MicroserviceError - when component class was not found.

      • create

        IComponent create(ComponentDescriptor descriptor)
           throws MicroserviceError
        Create a component instance using class located by component descriptor.
        Parameters:
        descriptor - a component descriptor to locate a component class.
        Returns:
        a created component instance.
        Throws:
        MicroserviceError - when class to construct component wasn't found, when constructor failed or component doesn't implements required interfaces.
